entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is the son of Harry and Ginny, who is about to board the train. He is described as having a 'thin face' and being 'ablaze with excitement'. (The text states: 'Harry walked alongside it, watching his son's thin face, already ablaze with excitement.')

entities.name: rose
entities.description: Rose is a student who is on the train and is craning around to look at Albus. (The text states: 'Albus, Rose, Hugo, and Lily laughed.')

entities.name: hugo
entities.description: Hugo is a student who is on the train and is laughing with Albus, Rose, and Lily. (The text states: 'Albus, Rose, Hugo, and Lily laughed.')

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is a student who is on the train and is laughing with Albus, Rose, and Hugo. (The text states: 'Albus, Rose, Hugo, and Lily laughed.')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is on the train and tells Albus not to worry about being stared at. He says it's because he's famous. (The text states: '
